mapper.select: SELECT a.file_id AS fileId, a.id AS id, a.group_code AS groupCode, a.local_id AS localId, b.save_path AS src FROM czb_file_function a LEFT JOIN czb_file b ON a.file_id = b.file_id WHERE a.local_id = #{shopId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND a.group_code = #{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.delete: delete from czb_file_function where file_id in ( ${deleteIds,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
